actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill relating to the operation of the Bolivar Dam and Reservoir, Ohio.

summary.text: States that any buildings in existence on the date of enactment of this Act which is on any real property subject to any flood easement or other right of the United States to back water up to elevation 962 feet above sea level in the operation of the Bolivar Dam and Reservoir, Ohio, shall be subject to removal only if such building has a first floor elevation 10 feet or more below such 962 feet elevation.

titles.title: A bill relating to the operation of the Bolivar Dam and Reservoir, Ohio.
